title: Crystal Protein Gel Treatment Mascara
description: Shop Prosa Crystal Protein Gel Treatment Mascara and earn points at Glamour Us! Discover affordable Makeup products. Get free shipping.
cleaned_text: Description INSTRUCTIONS FOR USE Eyelashes: Apply 1 or 2 layers for a very natural look or use it as a base before the usual mascara to achieve greater Volumen. Eyebrows: Apply a light layer to keep them combed all day. Avoid contact with the inner part of the eye.
